snippet: Bain Capital and other leading private equity firms are depicted in court documents as unofficial partners in a bid-rigging conspiracy aimed at holding down the prices of businesses they were seeking to buy.
abstract: Bain Capital and other leading private equity firms are depicted in court documents as unofficial partners in a bid-rigging conspiracy aimed at holding down the prices of businesses they were seeking to buy.

headline.main: In Documents, Private Equity Firms Are Depicted as Colluding
